marklogic.body: MUHAMMAD, You would not want 1 Koran Burned for every minute that you have a call out for Mr. Zimmerman. He gets his trial in April, or you will find it difficult to find a copy of the Koran anywhere in this country. You will not even know who Burned them. Call your dogs Off! We know how badly Obama is pushing for a Revolution. Don't be stupid and do his dirty work. We are going to vote, and you are not getting a Revolution. My God is already starting to punish you. Have you noticed how short many of you are getting? Give this man a fair trial, or get out of the way! Delores Smith Delores109@cox.net
